conclusion: Analyze the flow paths from points A, B, and C to determine which container the liquid will flow into.
Liquid encounters a green baffle that directs it to the right from A.
Liquid continues downward and flows into container D from A.
Liquid encounters a blue baffle that directs it to the right from B.
Liquid continues downward and flows into container D from B.
Liquid encounters a green baffle that directs it to the right from C.
Liquid continues downward and flows into container D from C.
All the liquid from points A, B, and C will flow into container D after passing through the baffles.
The liquid will flow into container D.
